text.en: Homage to the guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: Great being, perfect embodiment of the infinite Three Roots,
text.en-trans: tsa sum rabjam düpé daknyi ché

text.en: Mahāguru Padmasambhava,
text.en-trans: maha guru pema jungné la

text.en: With unbearably intense and fervent longing, I pray to you:
text.en-trans: zömé dungshuk drakpö solwa deb

text.en: Dispel all obstacles and grant me supreme and common siddhis!
text.en-trans: barché kün sel choktün ngödrub tsol

text.en: Natural expression of the enlightened activities of the buddhas and their heirs,
text.en-trans: gyalwa sé dang chepé trinlé kyi

text.en: Reverend lady Tārā,
text.en-trans: rang zuk jetsün pakma drolma la

text.en: To you I pray with confident and fervent longing:
text.en-trans: yiché dungshuk drakpö solwa deb

text.en: May you always inspire me with your blessing!
text.en-trans: taktu dak la jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Bestower of supreme deathlessness glowing like the moon,
text.en-trans: chimé chok jin dawé dangden ma

text.en: Your seven eyes of wisdom bright and distinct.
text.en-trans: yeshe chen dün nampar trawa yi

text.en: Noble lady of immortality, Wish-Fulfilling Wheel—
text.en-trans: chimé pakma yizhin khorlo la

text.en: To you I pray: grant me siddhi of longevity!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so tsé yi ngödrub tsol

text.en: Destroyer who subjugates all māras and samaya violators,
text.en-trans: dü dang damsi tamché dulwé shé

text.en: In a form that carries out the enlightened activity of all the victorious ones,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi trinlé jepö zuk

text.en: Great and glorious Vajrakumāra, king of the wrathful—
text.en-trans: palchen dorjé zhönnu trowö gyal

text.en: As I constantly carry out your practice, grant me victory over the māras!
text.en-trans: taktu khyö drub dü lé gyalwar dzö

text.en: With a terrifying form possessing the nine wrathful expressions,
text.en-trans: jikrung ku ni gar gü nyam denpé

text.en: You annihilate all māras, obstructors and negative forces.
text.en-trans: dü gek lokdren tamché dul du lak

text.en: Pañjaranātha Mahākāla, chief of all Dharma guardians—
text.en-trans: tensung kün gyi depön dorjé gur

text.en: Never be apart from me, but care for me as your own child!
text.en-trans: dak dang mindral bu zhin kyongwar dzö
